patthana18.22:1.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.22:2.1_0: Sārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:2.1_1: Anārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:2.1_2: Sārammaṇaṁ nahetuñca anārammaṇaṁ nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanārammaṇo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi,
patthana18.22:2.1_3: adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:3.1_0: Nocittaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocitto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:4.1_0: Cittaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:5.1_0: Cetasikaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:6.1_0: Cetasikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naacetasiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:7.1_0: Cittasampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.22:8.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:9.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.22:10.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:11.1_0: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasamuṭṭhāno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.22:13.1_0: Cittasahabhuṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.22:15.1_0: Cittānuparivattiṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.22:17.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.22:19.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.22:21.1_0: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.22:23.1_0: Bāhiraṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabāhiro nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:24.1_0: Ajjhattikaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.22:25.1_0: Noupādā hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoupādā nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana18.22:26.1_0: Upādā nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi,
patthana18.22:26.1_1: adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana18.22:27.1_0: Upādinnaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.22:28.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.22:28.1_2: adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana18.22:29.1_0: Upādinnaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana18.22:30.1_0: Anupādinnaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve,
patthana18.22:30.1_1: adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve.
